title: Zawlneiten an hrilh lawk Lal Messia kha
lyrics:
Zawlneiten an hrilh lawk Lal Messia kha,
Kaisara ni ropuiah a lothleng;
Lal thar lawmawm ani, fak r'u, fak r'u,
Lal thar lawmawma ni fak r'u, fak r'u.

Aw, angel var leh berampute, .
Mi fing lo kal. chhingkhuala min;
Chung siar leh mi thianghlimten,
Lawm takin Lal thar a piang tih min hrilh.

Lal zawng zawng lal angin a piang nem maw,
Bethlehem bawng in tlawmah a piang e;
A hming Maka. Lal chu fak r'u, fak r'u,
A hming Maka, Lal chu fak r'u, fak r'u.

Angelten thlahin hla mawi an rawn sa,
"Mihringte hnAnah rem leng se,"tiin;
Krista, Remna Lal chu fak r'u, fak r'u,
Krista, Remna Lal chu fak r'u, fak r'u.

Chhandamna dar Lal Jubili aw chuan,
Lei leh vanram zawng zawng a thang chhuak ta;
Lal Immanuela lawm r'u, lawm r'u,
Lal Immanuela lawm r'u, lawm r'u.
